headline: Expedia Group (EXPE): A Fresh Look at Valuation as Shares Sustain Strong Momentum
summary: Something has the markets talking about Expedia Group (EXPE) lately, as investors try to figure out if the current move in shares is just noise or a signal to pay closer attention. With no single news item lighting a fire under the stock, any shift in the price right now naturally sparks curiosity. For investors making decisions on travel and tech exposure, it raises the question: is this a turning point for the company or just a routine phase in its ongoing story? Looking at the bigger...
